anxiety.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the feeling of being very worried about something
anxiety.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: A high level of anxiety was created by the introduction of cameras into the factory.
It can help if you discuss your anxieties with someone.
The fear of unemployment can be a source of deep anxiety to people.
There is considerable anxiety among staff about job losses.
There is growing public anxiety over levels of air pollution in our cities.
anxiety.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a feeling of wanting to do something very much
anxiety.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: I nearly fell in my anxiety to get downstairs quickly.
